item.title: 美国中部天气转凉，美国天然气价格下跌
item.description: 由于天气预报显示美国中部地区天气转凉，美国天然气期货下跌。天然气储存量仍大大高于五年平均水平，引发了对市场持续供过于求的担忧。【原文：US natural gas futures fell as weather forecasts shifted cooler for the central part of the country. Gas storage remains significantly above the five-year average, inciting fears of a continued oversupplied market.】

item.title: 咆哮的凯蒂猫》因涉嫌 GameStop "抽水甩卖 "而被起诉
item.description: 人气股票影响者基思-吉尔（Keith Gill），人称 "Roaring Kitty"，因涉嫌策划涉及 GameStop 公司股票的 "抽水抛售 "计划而被起诉。【原文：Popular stocks influencer Keith Gill, better known as “Roaring Kitty,” was sued for allegedly orchestrating a “pump and dump” scheme involving GameStop Corp. shares.】

item.title: 米莱伊表示，如果通胀进一步降温，他将放缓缩表速度
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊周日晚概述了他对阿根廷未来货币政策的设想，称如果通胀降温到一定程度，比索的贬值速度可能会放缓。【原文：President Javier Milei outlined his vision for the future of Argentina’s currency policy Sunday night, saying the peso could weaken at a slower pace if inflation cools to a certain level.】

item.title: 乌干达领导人命令议会重新审议预算提案
item.description: 在约韦里-穆塞韦尼总统拒绝将 2024-25 年国家支出计划签署为法律之后，乌干达立法者将重新审议该计划。【原文：Ugandan lawmakers will reconsider the nation’s 2024-25 spending plan after President Yoweri Museveni declined to sign it into law.】

item.title: 美国工厂活动连续第三个月萎缩，价格趋缓
item.description: US factory activity contracted slightly for a third straight month in June, while a measure of prices fell by the most in more than a year.

item.title: 埃克森称罢工导致法国炼油厂运营中断
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp）位于法国北部的格拉文雄（Gravenchon）炼油厂发生罢工，导致该厂的燃料生产复杂化，该公司重申，该厂面临停产风险。【原文：A strike at Exxon Mobil Corp.’s Gravenchon oil refinery in northern France is complicating the production of fuels at the site, the company said, repeating that the plant is at risk of halting.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利提示特朗普风险，国债收益率继续攀升
item.description: 美国国债周一下跌，将收益率推升至一周多以来的最高水平，交易商称这是上周唐纳德-特朗普连任的可能性上升所带来的持续影响。【原文：US Treasuries fell on Monday, pushing yields to the highest levels in more than a week, in what traders said was ongoing fallout from last week’s bump in the odds of a second term for Donald Trump.】

item.title: 贝莱德在 Preqin 交易后的目标是 "编制私募市场指数
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）表示，收购数据提供商 Preqin 将使这家以指数基金著称的公司能够将这种形式应用于快速增长的资产。【原文：BlackRock Inc. Chief Executive Officer Larry Fink said its acquisition of data provider Preqin will allow the firm, best known for its index funds, to apply the format to fast-growing assets.】

item.title: 意大利萨尔维尼表示联盟将加入欧尔班的新欧盟集团
item.description: 意大利联盟党领袖马泰奥-萨尔维尼（Matteo Salvini）是向匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）的新民族主义联盟提供支持的极右翼政治家之一。【原文：Italy’s League party leader Matteo Salvini is among the far-right politicians offering support to Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s new nationalist alliance, a nascent hard-right group in the European parliament.】

item.title: 欧洲央行下令削减俄罗斯信贷后，裕信银行要求法院作出澄清
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）要求欧洲一家高级法院评估其主要监管机构迫使这家意大利贷款机构进一步减少在俄罗斯业务的决定中某些内容的合法性。【原文：UniCredit SpA asked a top European court to assess the legality of some elements in a decision by its main regulator forcing the Italian lender to further reduce its presence in Russia.】

item.title: 德国通胀放缓，经济反弹乐观情绪减弱
item.description: 由于德国经济复苏出现停滞迹象，德国通胀率在连续两个月加速后有所放缓。【原文：German inflation slowed after two months of accelerating as the country’s economic recovery showed signs of stalling.】

item.title: 降价和技术升级使比亚迪销量创下新高
item.description: 彭博新闻社汇编的销售数据显示，由于降价和新技术刺激了消费者的购买欲，比亚迪公司第二季度的电动汽车和混合动力汽车销量创下历史新高。【原文：BYD Co. sold a record number of electric and hybrid cars in the second quarter, sales data compiled by Bloomberg News shows, as price cuts and new technology stoked consumers into purchases.】

item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. 是最新一家推出交易所交易基金的资产管理公司。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is the latest asset manager to launch an exchange-traded fund that offers a way to ride the stock rally — while hedging 100% of the downside if markets plunge.】

item.title: Ascendent 17 亿美元收购好利时获中国批准
item.description: Ascendent Capital Partners Ltd. 拟以 16.6 亿美元收购在美国上市的好利时自动化技术有限公司，并已获得中国同意，从而可能结束对这家中国工业公司长达三年多的争夺。【原文：Ascendent Capital Partners Ltd. has won China’s consent for its proposed $1.66 billion takeover of US-listed Hollysys Automation Technologies Ltd., potentially ending the more than three-year contest for the Chinese industrial company.】

item.title: 克劳尔以 9 亿美元估值押注人工智能初创公司 K Health
item.description: K Health是一家人工智能公司，在患者与以初级保健为主的医生交谈之前为其提供聊天机器人，该公司首席执行官阿隆-布洛赫（Aaron Bloch）在接受采访时表示，该公司在马塞洛-克劳尔（Marcelo Claure）的克劳尔集团（Claure Group）领投的一轮股权融资中筹集了5000万美元。【原文：K Health, an artificial intelligence company that provides a chatbot to patients before they speak with primary care-focused physicians, raised $50 million in an equity funding round led by Marcelo Claure’s Claure Group, Chief Executive Officer Allon Bloch said in an interview.】

item.title: 越南前 FLC 主席股票欺诈案审判将于本月开始
item.description: 根据政府网站上的公告，对房地产开发商 FLC Group JSC 前董事长 Trinh Van Quyet 及其他 49 名被告的股票操纵案的审判将于 7 月 22 日开始。【原文：The stock manipulation trial of real estate developer FLC Group JSC’s former chairman Trinh Van Quyet and 49 other defendants will begin July 22, according to a posting on the government’s website.】

item.title: 波兰重启为欧盟最昂贵抵押贷款提供补贴的计划
item.description: 波兰政府正在重启帮助借款人偿还欧盟最昂贵抵押贷款的计划。【原文：Poland’s government is reviving plans to help borrowers struggling to pay back the European Union’s costliest mortgages.】

item.title: 对冲基金在电池金属低迷之际囤积钴矿
item.description: 包括 Anchorage Capital Advisors 和 Squarepoint Capital LLP 在内的对冲基金一直在通过买入实物材料建立钴仓位，因为现货价格下跌和流动性更强的期货市场为这种电池金属创造了新的交易机会。【原文：Hedge funds including Anchorage Capital Advisors and Squarepoint Capital LLP have been building positions in cobalt by buying up physical material, as tumbling spot prices and a more liquid futures market create new trading opportunities in the battery metal.】

item.title: 波音公司因欺诈指控和 Spirit 公司的交易而首当其冲
item.description: 在机身爆炸事故使波音公司陷入危机六个月后，这起近乎灾难性的事故所带来的法律和财务后果正向这家陷入困境的美国飞机制造商全面压来。【原文：Six months after a fuselage blowout threw Boeing Co. into crisis, the full weight of the legal and financial fallout from the near-catastrophic accident is bearing down on the embattled US planemaker.】

item.title: 基思-吉尔披露持有 2.45 亿美元股份后，Chewy 股价大涨
item.description: 周一盘前交易中，Chewy Inc. 股价最高上涨 29%，此前 Keith Gill 披露被动持有这家在线宠物食品和产品零售商 6.6% 的股份。【原文：Chewy Inc. shares rose as much as 29% in premarket trading Monday after Keith Gill disclosed a 6.6% passive stake in the online pet food and product retailer.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。法国的中间派和左翼政党正在竞相阻止该国极右翼在第一轮立法选举后的势头。波音公司（Boeing）将结束数十年的分离状态，收购 Spirit Aero，而贝莱德集团（BlackRock）正在扩大其私人资产能力。24 小时股票交易的蓬勃发展令华尔街哗然。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题— Morwenna Coniam【原文：Good morning. France’s centrist and left-wing parties are racing to stop the momentum of the country’s far right following the first round in a legislative election. Boeing is ending decades of separation as it moves to buy Spirit Aero, while BlackRock is expanding its private asset capabilities. And a boom in 24-hour stock trading is rattling Wall Street. Here’s what traders are talking about — Morwenna Coniam】

item.title: 据说马士基考虑退出德铁信可竞标
item.description: 美联社 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Moeller-Maersk A/S公司正在考虑放弃对德国铁路股份公司（Deutsche Bahn AG）旗下物流部门德铁信可公司（DB Schenker）的收购。【原文：AP Moeller-Maersk A/S is considering dropping it pursuit of DB Schenker, the logistics unit of Deutsche Bahn AG, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 震撼拉美的对冲基金鲸鱼在墨西哥曝光
item.description: 6 月 7 日清晨，墨西哥利率期货大幅飙升。整整一周以来，即使比索在执政的左派政党取得压倒性胜利后暴跌，利率期货仍保持稳定。但现在，抛售突然蔓延到了利率市场。【原文：Early in the morning of June 7, interest-rate futures spiked wildly in Mexico. All week long, they had held steady even as the peso plunged in the wake of the ruling leftist party’s landslide election victory. But now, the selloff was suddenly spilling into the rates market.】

item.title: Revolut 准备 2023 年业绩，推动英国银行执照申请
item.description: Revolut Ltd.在其审计师签署了 2023 年的账目后，正在准备其 2023 年的财务业绩，这使得这家金融科技公司远远早于 9 月份公布数据的法定截止日期。【原文：Revolut Ltd. is readying its financial results for 2023 after its auditor signed off on the accounts, putting the fintech well ahead of a September statutory deadline to publish the figures.】

item.title: 中国共同基金要求债券经纪商降低交易费用
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国一些最大的共同基金正在要求债券经纪人降低交易费用。【原文：Some of China’s biggest mutual funds are asking bond brokers to lower their trading fees, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Meta 将因 Instagram 和 Facebook 的无广告问题受到欧盟警告
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司将因其在 Instagram 和 Facebook 上提供无广告服务的订阅模式而受到警告，在欧盟根据严厉的新规定对大科技公司发起的最新攻击中，该公司可能面临被重罚的风险。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is set to be slapped with a warning over its subscription model for ad-free services on Instagram and Facebook, risking potentially heavy fines in the European Union’s latest attack on Big Tech under tough new rules.】
